subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Muguruza has reached her first major final at Wimbledon, but her opponent will be Serena Williams, who has a record of 20-4 in singles finals in the majors.
snippet: Muguruza has reached her first major final at Wimbledon, but her opponent will be Serena Williams, who has a record of 20-4 in singles finals in the majors.
